se.cbb.jprime.prm

Interface DiscreteAttribute

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<ProbAttribute>, ProbAttribute
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanAttribute, IntAttribute

    public interface DiscreteAttribute
extends ProbAttribute
    Interface for discrete valued PRM attributes. Any value should be able to represented as an integer in the range 0,...,k-1. For latent attributes, there is a dual representation in that a value (= hard assignment) may exist alongside a probability distribution for all values (= soft assignment).
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface se.cbb.jprime.prm.ProbAttribute

        ProbAttribute.DataType, ProbAttribute.DependencyConstraints

    • Method Detail

      • getNoOfValues

        int getNoOfValues()
        Returns the number of valid values of this attribute, i.e. k for the range 0,...,k-1.
        Returns:
        the number of values.

      • getEntityAsInt

        int getEntityAsInt(int idx)
        Returns the integer representation of an entity's value. For latent values, returns the current hard assignment.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index.
        Returns:
        the value in the range 0,...,k-1.

      • setEntityAsInt

        void setEntityAsInt(int idx,
                  int value)
        Setter mirroring getEntityAsInt(). If latent, does not affect the corresponding soft completion. No bounds checking.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index.
        value - the value in the range 0,...,k-1.

      • addEntityAsInt

        void addEntityAsInt(int value)
        Adds an entity as an integer. If latent, this also adds a corresponding soft completion for the entity. See getEntityAsInt() for more info.
        Parameters:
        value - the value in the range 0,...,k-1.

      • getEntityProbDistribution

        double[] getEntityProbDistribution(int idx)
        For latent attributes, returns the current estimation of an entity's probability distribution, i.e., its soft completion. Indexing complies with the getEntityAsInt() method.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index.
        Returns:
        the estimated probability distribution.

      • setEntityProbDistribution

        void setEntityProbDistribution(int idx,
                             double[] probDist)
        For latent attributes, sets the current estimation of an entity's probability distribution, i.e., its soft completion. Does not affect the corresponding current hard assignment. Indexing complies with the getEntityAsInt() method.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index.
        probDist - the soft completion.

      • clearEntityProbDistribution

        void clearEntityProbDistribution(int idx)
        For latent attributes, sets the current estimation of an entity's soft completion to NaN for all values.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index.

      • normaliseEntityProbDistribution

        void normaliseEntityProbDistribution(int idx)
        For latent attributes, normalises the current estimation of an entity's soft completion so that they sum up to 1. A NaN value is considered 0.0.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index.

      • useSharpSoftCompletion

        void useSharpSoftCompletion()
        For a latent attribute, sets the soft completion of a value to 1.0 for precisely that value. Mostly for debugging purposes. Only applicable on latent attributes.

      • getMostProbEntityAsInt

        int getMostProbEntityAsInt(int idx)
        For a latent attribute entity, returns the highest ranked value in its current soft completion. Indexing complies with the getEntityAsInt() method.
        Parameters:
        idx - the entity.
        Returns:
        the value with the highest soft completion score.

      • perturbEntityProbDistribution

        void perturbEntityProbDistribution(int idx)
        For a latent attribute entity, alters it current soft completion.
        Parameters:
        idx - the entity.

      • assignRandomValues

        void assignRandomValues(java.util.Random rng)
        For a latent attribute, assigns random values to all entities.
        Parameters:
        rng - the random number generator.
